name: British Airways **Red Nose** 767 landing and taxi at Calgary
description:
Well, well, well! It looks like ol' St. Nick finally traded in that sleigh for something a bit bigger! Lol :) 

This one was kind of rare... But the video kinda sucked :/
I was busy filming an Air Transat A330 departing when I heard something big, and lo and behold, there it was, a BA 767 with a red nose! I hope you enjoy this video, even though it's not my best  :/

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
_____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO

Aircraft registration: G-BNWW
Callsign: Speedbird 103 Heavy
Runway used:
